00074 #ifndef DOXYGEN_SHOULD_SKIP_THIS
00075 
00076 #ifndef INLINE
00077 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
00078 #define INLINE __inline
00079 #elif defined(__GNUC__)
00080 #define INLINE __inline__
00081 #else
00082 #define INLINE
00083 #endif
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 /* make functions under WinNT dll exportable */
00087 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(MIDAS_DLL)
00088 #define EXPRT __declspec(dllexport)
00089 #else
00090 #define EXPRT
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 #define EXTERNAL extern
00094 
00095 #ifndef MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED
00096 #define MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED
00097 
00098 typedef unsigned char BYTE;
00099 typedef unsigned short int WORD;
00100 
00101 #ifdef __alpha
00102 typedef unsigned int DWORD;
00103 #else
00104 typedef unsigned long int DWORD;
00105 #endif
00106 
00107 #define SUCCESS  1
00108 
00109 #endif                          /* MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED */
